title: Wing Luke Museum Affiliated Area: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           719 South King Street  Seattle, WA 98104                 Directions         Coming from North of I-5: Take exit 165A toward James St. Once you get off the highway, merge right onto 6th Ave and follow the road. You will enter the heart of the district after passing Jackson Street. Coming from South of I-5: Take exit 164A toward James St./Madison St./Dearborn St. Follow signs for Dearborn St. and then turn left at S.Dearborn St. Turn right at 6th Ave S. and you will enter the heart of the district.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Hours On the first Thursday of every month, the Museum is open 10am - 8pm.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Monday: Closed   Tuesday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Thursday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Friday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Saturday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM             Weather           The Wing Luke may close in the case of inclement weather. If you are unsure, please call the museum at 206.623.5124 after 10am to confirm that it is open.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Museum Experience General Admission - Adults - $14.95 Includes a guided historic hotel tour and gallery admission.   Museum Experience General Admission - Seniors - $11.95 Includes a guided historic hotel tour and gallery admission.   Museum Experience General Admission - Students - $10.95 For students 13-18 or with student ID. Includes a guided historic hotel tour and gallery admission.    Museum Experience General Admission - Children - $9.95 For Children 5-12. Includes a guided historic hotel tour and gallery admission.    Museum Experience General Admission - Under 5 - $0.00 Includes a guided historic hotel tour and gallery admission.    Touch of Chinatown Tour - Adults - $19.95 Includes a guided neighborhood tour and gallery admission. Tours are available Tuesday - Saturday at 2pm.    Touch of Chinatown Tour - Seniors - $17.95 Includes a guided neighborhood tour and gallery admission. Tours are available Tuesday - Saturday at 2pm.    Touch of Chinatown Tour - Students - $14.95 For students 13-18 or with student ID. Includes a guided neighborhood tour and gallery admission. Tours are available Tuesday - Saturday at 2pm.    Touch of Chinatown Tour - Children - $12.95 For children 5-12. Includes a guided neighborhood tour and gallery admission. Tours are available Tuesday - Saturday at 2pm.    Touch of Chinatown Tour - Under 5 - $0.00 Includes a guided neighborhood tour and gallery admission. Tours are available Tuesday - Saturday at 2pm.          Visitor Centers              Â   Address719 South King Street (between 7th and 8th Avenue South)Seattle, WA  98104HoursTuesday-Sunday: 10am-5pmMonday: closedFirst Thursday of the month: 10am-8pm Click here for general directions by car or public transportation.
